CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 热切的；渴望的；热心的；急切的；渴求的；热望的；热衷的；渴盼的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 强调因忧虑、关注或害怕而产生的急切心情。
强调因兴趣强烈或欲望而急于做某事。
侧重于急于成功的迫切心情。

bilingual.source: My eager hands press emptiness to my heart and it bruises my heart.
bilingual.target: 我热切的双手把空虚压在我的心口,压碎了我的心.

bilingual.source: The eager Apollo followed her closely behind, calling out to her to stop.
bilingual.target: 热切的太阳神紧随其后，竭力叫喊让她止步。

bilingual.source: Our life is eager, our desires are keen, for time tolls the bell of parting.
bilingual.target: 我们的生命是热切的, 我们的渴望是强烈的, 因为时间鸣奏着离别之钟.

bilingual.source: And still they sing a vehement, eager chant, the chant of the turbulent waters.
bilingual.target: 就这样他们还是唱着激昂而热切的号子，那汹涌澎湃的河水号子。

bilingual.source: Ironically, U.S. foreign policy would probably be more effective if Americans were less convinced of their own unique virtues and less eager to proclaim them.
bilingual.target: 具有讽刺意味的是，如果美国人不那么看重自己独特的高尚品质，并且不那么热切的将其到处宣扬的话，美国的许多外交政策或许会更有效的得到推行。

bilingual.source: Only 50 feet away, 200 eager campers were bumping bodies, playing, joking and meeting each other, but the boy under the tree seemed to want to be anywhere other than where he was.
bilingual.target: 在离他只有50英尺的地方，200个热切的营员们在打闹、玩笑、聊天，但树下男孩似乎除了他呆的地方，哪里都不想去。

bilingual.source: Jane is eager to share the magazine article with Luke.
bilingual.target: 简迫不及待地想和卢克分享这篇杂志文章。

bilingual.source: Not realising who Gary was, the assistant was eager to carry out his duty properly this time.
bilingual.target: 没有意识到加里的身份，店员这次急于正确履行他的职责。

bilingual.source: She is eager to start her new job.
bilingual.target: 她渴望开始她的新工作。

list.abstract: eager（英 [ˈiːɡə]，美 [ˈiːɡər]），英语单词，作形容词时，为渴望的；热切的。短语搭配有be eager to（急于）。例句为“He was eager to earn money.（他渴望挣钱。）” eager形容词类近义词有hungry、desired等，反义词有uneager。

yingyinNormal.en: I know ladies don't seek to seem too eager...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我了解小姐们都会矜持推诿一下……

yingyinNormal.en: I know you are eager to answer their calls, but your training is not yet complete.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你们急於给予敌人猛烈的回击，但是你们的训练还没有全部完成。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you for purchasing the movie 3000. I am eager and ready to shoot your first movie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你购买电影3000！我迫不及待想你拍第一部影片了。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you for purchasing the movie 3000! I am eager and ready to shoot your first movie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你购买电影3000！我迫不及待想你拍第一部影片了。

yingyinNormal.en: I hadn't really loved him. It was just a fling. I was more eager than ever to rejoin Space Corp.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我从未真正爱过他，只是一时放纵，我加入太空公司的愿望更加强烈了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's lame, I know. But I'm a goal-oriented person, very eager to learn. Okay, hold on just a second.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那些经验很烂，我知道，但我是目标导向的那种人，渴望学习。请等一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Good morning. If I could have everyone's attention, please? I know we're all eager to get on the road to Big Sur.
yingyinNormal.zh: 早上好，大家请注意？我知道我们都想尽快开往大苏。

yingyinNormal.en: I had to call my 9-year-old grandson just to find out what a USB connector was. But I'll get there. Eager to learn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还不得不打电话问了我九岁的孙子，就为了问USB接口是什么东西。但我会学会的，我渴望去学习。

yingyinNormal.en: One of the things that happens to every university professor is that at the beginning of each semester, the students come incredibly eager.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每个学期开学的时候，大学教授们都会看到同样的情况，学生们的求学之心尤为热切。

yingyinNormal.en: A lot of lonely young men down here. Supposed to keep their hands off the merchandise. Creates something of an opening that I'm sure you were eager to fill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这下面有好多孤寂的小伙子啊，他们本来是不可以碰商品的，创造某种开口，我相信你一定迫不及待地"插满"。

yingyinNormal.en: I see. Who is supposed to have shot him, then? Some over-eager squaddie with an itchy trigger finger, that's who. That's not what happened at all. It is now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我明白了，这样一来，是谁开的枪？某个迫不及待的士兵手痒扣动了扳机而已。这根本就不是真相。现在是了。

yingyinNormal.en: You take an eager interest in that gentleman's concerns. He told me of his misfortunes. Oh, yes, his misfortunes have been very great indeed. You ruin his chances and yet you treat him with sarcasm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你对他的确十分关心。他告诉了我他的不幸遭遇。哦，他的确太不幸啦。你毁了他，现在更讥讽他。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 渴望做某事；急于做某事

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) wanting to do or have something very much

examination_example.sentence: Companies are <highlight>eager</highlight> to win patents for "connecting the dots", explains Hans Sauer, a lawyer for the BIO.
examination_example.sentence_trans: BIO的律师Hans Sauer 解释道，公司渴望获得专利，以便“归纳推理得出结论”。

examination_example.sentence: According to Hans Sauer, companies are <highlight>eager</highlight> to win patents for establishing disease comelations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Hans Sauer表示，公司急于获得建立疾病相关性的专利。

word_usage.usage:
be eager for sth.和be eager to do sth.都可以表示“渴望做某事”，如：
She is eager for her parents' approval.
她渴望得到父母的赞许。 
Everyone in the class seemed eager to learn. 
班上每个人似乎都热爱学习。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) wanting to do or have something very much

examination_example.sentence: Grand Tourists were <highlight>eager</highlight> to acquire examples of Greco-Roman and Italian art for their own collections.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “大游客”(Grand Tourist)渴望获取希腊罗马和意大利艺术品，希望其成为自己的收藏品。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 强调因忧虑、关注或害怕而产生的急切心情。
侧重于急于成功的迫切心情。
强调因兴趣强烈或欲望而急于做某事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) wanting to do or have something very much

examination_example.sentence: School kids are <highlight>eager</highlight> to get a new lunch box every year to stay in fashion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学校的孩子们渴望每年得到一个新的午餐盒，以保持时尚。

examination_example.sentence: At about 18 months of age, Lancy says, most children become <highlight>eager</highlight> to help their parents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 兰西说，在大约18个月大的时候，大多数孩子开始渴望帮助他们的父母。

examination_example.sentence: Asian-American students have been <highlight>eager</highlight> participants in a state program.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚裔美国学生一直热衷于参加一个州项目。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 强调因忧虑、关注或害怕而产生的急切心情。
侧重于急于成功的迫切心情。
强调因兴趣强烈或欲望而急于做某事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) wanting to do or have something very much

examination_example.sentence: As she was leaving, she was <highlight>eager</highlight> to say goodbye to each of us in the nursing team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当她要离开的时候，她渴望和护理团队的每一个人道别。

examination_example.sentence: Some of us were confident and <highlight>eager</highlight> to take part in the class activity, others were nervous and anxious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们中有些人信心十足，渴望参加班级活动，有些人则紧张焦虑。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 强调因忧虑、关注或害怕而产生的急切心情。
侧重于急于成功的迫切心情。
强调因兴趣强烈或欲望而急于做某事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) wanting to do or have something very much

examination_example.sentence: The sunset picture was the one he was most <highlight>eager</highlight> to see.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 日落照片是他最想看的。

examination_example.sentence: A girl's closest friend, however, might be <highlight>eager</highlight> (急切的) to tell her about something that has happened in her life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，一个女孩最亲密的朋友可能会急于告诉她生活中发生的一些事情。

examination_example.sentence: People and animals are <highlight>eager</highlight> to know things because getting that information means a reward.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类和动物都渴望知道一些事情，因为获得这些信息意味着一种奖励。
